T09D4157:103b-1: bo dhi satva dz'a ta ka sya dharmma gand'i /
T09D4157:103b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos kyi gand'i /
T09D4157:103b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T09D4157:103b-5: rab mtho brag ri'i rtse yi yul ngos rab zhi bde ba'i longs spyod 'dug 'dug pas //
T09D4157:103b-6: de 'og stag mo bkres pas gnam g-yos mtha' dag phyogs su mchi mar ldan zhum mig blta ba //
T09D4157:103b-7: bdag nyid bu yang gsad 'dod de la der ni thugs brtses rang gi lus byin mdzad pa gang //
T09D4157:103b-8: de ni 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas 'dod lha'i stobs 'joms chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:103b-9: rab tu dbang 'byor bdag po shi ba'i mi bdag dus rnams thams cad du //
T09D4157:103b-10: 'jig rten gcig tu thugs brtses bskul te rgyas par sbyin pa'i chu yi char gyis tshim mdzad la //
T09D4157:103b-11: long ba'i bram zes spyan ni gcig blangs pa las gnyis ka yang ni byin par 'gyur //
T09D4157:103b-12: rang dga'i mchog brnyes des ni srid pa gsum po'i 'jigs bcom chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:103b-13: grong khyer 'dir ni dman pa'i gla mis rang nyid zas bcad don gnyer rang sangs rgyas zhig la //
T09D4157:103b-14: lhad zan changs pas yang dag bkur byas mchod pa de yis grong khyer der ni ko sa la'i //
T09D4157:103b-15: dbang phyug nyid thob dge ba yongs gyur rmad du byung ba'i rgyal por gyur te de la 'dir //
T09D4157:103b-16: 'jig rten gsum du ngo mtshar sgra bsgrags 'dir ni thub pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:103b-17: bsod snyoms don gnyer 'dod chags bral la bdag nyid sngon skyid bsod snyoms sbyin pa las //
T09D4157:104a-0: rab tu rab 'jigs dmyal ba sprul te mngon par log brjod lha @104a * //
T09D4157:104a-1: yi bu yis bkag pa las //
T09D4157:104a-2: de dag ma mnyan dmyal skyes padma'i sdong bu mdzes la rim gyis gom pa dor nas ni //
T09D4157:104a-3: de 'dir bdud las rgyal gyur lha mi'i bla ma de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104a-4: sbyin la goms pas rab tu phul byung mtha' dag rtog pa'i tshong dpon gang gi nor //
T09D4157:104a-5: lha yi dbang po de yi nor sbas na yang
T09D4157:104a-6: zad par ma nus de ni sbyin pa'i chos dang
T09D4157:104a-7: ldan // 'di ltar des ni phongs pa zil mnan nyams par byed bcom pa de yi //
T09D4157:104a-8: nyon mongs rab zad stobs bcu'i stobs mda' ston pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104a-9: ri bong lus 'dzin brgya byin lus gzhan bsgyur ba gang de rnam sprul du med pa yi me //
T09D4157:104a-10: rab gsal gser gyi 'od 'tsher me stag tshogs 'phro mi bzad par ni mchongs nas byin par gyur //
T09D4157:104a-11: de ni dbang pos mngon par gsal bar bstan pa'i don du sbyin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar tshul //
T09D4157:104a-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mtshan de rjes thub pa mchog gi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104a-13: bram ze aa ga sti zhes bya ba gang byung rgyas pa'i khyim skyes rtsva dang 'dra bar ni //
T09D4157:104a-14: bde bas yid byung rab zhi nges par byung ba'i gling ni nye gyur te //
T09D4157:104a-15: 'dab ma btsos pa tsam zhig gis tshim de yang dbang pos sbas byas mtha' dag rig mod kyi //
T09D4157:104a-16: gang 'dug nges tshim bstan pas phung tshogs mtha' dag rtsod rgyal chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104a-17: sa yi bdag po'i bla ma byams pa'i stobs ni byung gyur gang gi yang dag don gyi ming //
T09D4157:104a-18: bdag nyid lus ni bdag gis bcad cing phug ste sha dang khrag dag zos shing 'thung gyur gang //
T09D4157:104a-19: gnod sbyin lnga ni thog mar mngon par byung bas
T09D4157:104a-20: de kho na nyid thob pas tshim mdzad rgyal ba
T09D4157:104a-21: nyid // gcig pu rjes brtse dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104a-22: rang gis srog dang mnyam pa'i bu ni gsar pa'i
T09D4157:104a-23: lus dang yid 'ong btsun mo rjes su mthun pa
T09D4157:104a-24: dag / sdug bsngal zug rngur ldan pa'i mun sbrul
T09D4157:104a-25: bram zes rab 'gyed bzhin yang rab dags legs par
T09D4157:104a-26: byin // yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni
T09D4157:104a-27: smon lam mi g-yo gang gis thams cad sgrol de
T09D4157:104a-28: byin // yis // srid gsum dman pa'i 'dod las
T09D4157:104b-0: rnam par @104b rgyal bar gyur pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i
T09D4157:104b-1: byin // yis // sgra bsgrags so // mchod sbyin
T09D4157:104b-2: brtsams phyir rang gi 'jig rten dag la 'di skad
T09D4157:104b-3: smras te skyes bu dag /'di ltar skye bo sdig
T09D4157:104b-4: pas mchod sbyin byed rnams myur du rlag par 'gyur
T09D4157:104b-6: 'dir ni skye bo'i tshogs rnams sdig pa las ldog dge ba bcu yi lam nyid la gzhag cing //
T09D4157:104b-7: 'phel bar byed pa gang yin thub de'i rjes su snyan pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104b-8: lha min grong khyer tshal du lha rnams pham gyur lhan cig bros tshe brgya byin gzugs 'dzin kyis //
T09D4157:104b-9: mkha' lding phru gu shing rta'i lam gnas nyams par mthong ste lha rnams lha smra brtse ba yis //
T09D4157:104b-10: bdag nyid gcig pu'i shing rta phyir log grong khyer sa gzhir zhugs te gang gis lha min las //
T09D4157:104b-11: rgyal gyur de yi rjes brtses 'gro ba gsum las rnam rgyal chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104b-12: bram ze gang zhig legs par spyod dang yul gzhan brtan zhing zab mo'i shis dang ldan dbul bor //
T09D4157:104b-13: rang gi rnam gsal byas nas sus kyang mtshor bar ni brkur rung zhes //
T09D4157:104b-14: mkhan po'i cho gas gzhan nor brlag bstan 'gog par byed ldan de ni slob mas ma mnyan te //
T09D4157:104b-15: gzhan gyi nor brlag mi byed rnyog pa med pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:104b-16: bud med rin chen gang zhig ji bzhin don ming mtha' dag 'jig rten myos byed byung bar gyur //
T09D4157:104b-17: sa yi bdag po shin tu gzhon sdug de las
T09D4157:104b-18: skyes pa'i 'dod chags thob gyur na 'ang gang de
T09D4157:104b-19: la // de las byung ba'i me yis bdag gi
T09D4157:104b-20: srog bsregs kyang ni tshul khrims lhod cing nyams ma
T09D4157:104b-21: la // gyur // de lta'i tshul khrims phung pos
T09D4157:104b-22: gsal zhing rab tu snyan pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra
T09D4157:104b-23: la // gyur // bsgrags so // gang zhig gru
T09D4157:104b-24: bo'i tshong pas 'gron bsgrubs 'dod pas gsol btab de
T09D4157:104b-25: dag bltas nas gru bor ni //
T09D4157:104b-26: dka' bas bdag nyid zhugs gyur rlung chen shugs rlabs kyis ni rgya mtshor bying bar gyur pa'i tshe //
T09D4157:104b-27: bden pa'i tshig brjod pas ni rlung gis gru bo phyir log dga' mtha'i ngos su khyer song gyur //
T09D4157:104b-28: rab mtho bsten pa'i bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:105a-0: lteng ka nyi ma'i zer gyis skams par @105a * //
T09D4157:105a-1: gnyen tshogs dang bcas nya dag la ni khra la sogs //
T09D4157:105a-2: bya tshogs rgyags pas phyogs kun nas bskor za bar 'dod pa rnams la bden pa'i tshig dag gis //
T09D4157:105a-3: byin rlabs gang brjod myur bar lha yi bdag pos
T09D4157:105a-4: char gyi rgyun phab srog chags rnams la yid mthun
T09D4157:105a-5: pas // rjes su srung byed rab zhi'i rang bzhin
T09D4157:105a-6: blo gros can des chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:105a-7: pas // // gang zhig chu 'dzin gzhan gyi zer
T09D4157:105a-8: las rgyal ba'i me yis bsregs te de dag rlung
T09D4157:105a-10: me rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khyab par byas te sreg pa phru gu za bar 'dod 'dra la //
T09D4157:105a-11: des ni zhi byed bden pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlabs brjod pa las zhi ba thob par gyur //
T09D4157:105a-12: brdzun gyi tshig las slar log bzod pa dang ldan de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:105a-13: mi yi bdag po thams cad bshes gnyen chang 'thung
T09D4157:105a-14: ba las mngon par dga' ba nyid gyur dbang pos
T09D4157:105a-15: ni // skyes bu de dag mthong ste bram ze'i
T09D4157:105a-16: gzugs bsgyur chang gis gang ba'i bum pa gang zhig
T09D4157:105a-17: ni // thogs // mi bdag skye tshogs bcas pa
T09D4157:105a-18: de dag mdun du chang gi nyes pa gang dag
T09D4157:105a-19: ni // thogs // bstan pa yin // de las
T09D4157:105a-20: des ni thams cad rnam par btul te skyon spangs
T09D4157:105a-21: pa yi mthu ldan chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:105a-22: ni // thogs // bstan pa yin // // bdag
T09D4157:105a-23: nyid rigs dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig byung gyur 'dod
T09D4157:105a-24: pa rgyas pa'i khyim las yid phyung nas //
T09D4157:105a-25: zhi bde 'dod pas zhi ba'i nags mthar song ste rab tu byung gyur pha mtshungs des //
T09D4157:105a-26: nye bar 'dod pa'i yid las gnyen gcig de la rang khyim nyes pa mngon par bstan nas kyang //
T09D4157:105a-27: 'dod bya min blos rab mchog gnas kyi bde rnyed de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:105a-28: pha ma dus 'das khyim gyi bde las skyo bar gang gyur bas mtha'i nags su gnas bcas te //
T09D4157:105a-29: des ni dran gzhag bi sa la yi 'dab ma
T09D4157:105a-30: rtag tu rung ba kham gyi zas kyis 'tsho byed
T09D4157:105a-31: de // brtan te nyams sad bya phyir lha yi
T09D4157:105a-32: dbang po der song gang gi skal ba'i 'dab ma
T09D4157:105a-33: de // ni // nyin lnga brkus na'ang bsam gtan
T09D4157:105a-34: brtan pa bdud rtsi'i ros 'tsho de yi chos kyi
T09D4157:105a-36: rgyal po'i gnang chen gyur nas nor gyi bdag po
T09D4157:105a-37: na tshod thog ma nad med pha yi lus ldan
T09D4157:105b-0: zhing // gnyen tshogs rnams @105b la byams dang ldan
T09D4157:105b-1: pa'i 'jig rten dag gi ded dpon mchog tu gyur
T09D4157:105b-2: zhing // pa gang // rab tu byung bar gyur
T09D4157:105b-3: ces 'di ltar mi bden par yang yon tan bsgrags
T09D4157:105b-5: legs par rab byung mtha' dag yon tan gtam gyi
T09D4157:105b-6: 'bras bcas de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:105b-7: // khyim gnas dga' yang nye bar spangs gyur gang
T09D4157:105b-8: 'gar brtse ba kho nas chung ma gcig yod las
T09D4157:105b-9: // // bas mtha' gang du gnas bcas rab zhi
T09D4157:105b-10: dga' bas gnas las der ni rgyal po gang gis
T09D4157:105b-11: // // de // brtag phyir brtul zhugs legs zhes
T09D4157:105b-12: bstod nas khyim thab phrogs kyang rab tu khro ba
T09D4157:105b-13: // // de // nges bcom ste // de la
T09D4157:105b-14: slar yang chos bstan rnam rgyal de yi rjes su
T09D4157:105b-15: chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:105b-16: sna tshogs yid bzhin mtsho ni dri ma med par bzhin bzangs mdun bdar ngang pa'i rgyal po ni //
T09D4157:105b-17: rgyal po thob gyur blon bor bcas bzung nas ni tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po thob gyur te //
T09D4157:105b-18: chos bstan kun nas nyon mongs sra ba'i bya rnyi las grol gang gyur 'gro ba gsum po yi //
T09D4157:105b-19: nyon mongs rnyi rnams rab tu bcom pa'i mkhas pa de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:105b-20: rgyal po gang gi gnas na gcig tu byams dang ldan pa'i kun du rgyu zhig yod gyur la //
T09D4157:105b-21: de yi bka' rig nas ni bdag nyid de gnas
T09D4157:105b-22: las song gang zhig gcig tu zhi ba'i nags mthar
T09D4157:105b-23: gnas // der ni mngon shes ye shes thob byas
T09D4157:105b-24: slar yang mi bdag de yi log lta'i dra ba
T09D4157:105b-25: gnas // las // rab tu bsrungs te lta ba
T09D4157:105b-26: spangs gyur sman pa de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra
T09D4157:105b-27: gnas // las // bsgrags so // bas mtha' gang
T09D4157:105b-28: du spre'u'i bdag nyid gyur nas mi yi yon tan
T09D4157:105b-29: las rgyal legs pa'i yon tan can //
T09D4157:105b-30: der ni mi zhig sdong po mchog chag g-yang sa
T09D4157:105b-31: cher lhung khur bur cho nges 'don pa mthong bar
T09D4157:105b-32: gyur // mthong nas kyang ni 'di ltar snying la
T09D4157:105b-33: rjes brtse yongs ldan gang des mchongs nas phyung ste
T09D4157:105b-34: gyur // brtas // mi bde rnams las srid gsum
T09D4157:105b-35: phan par mdzad pa de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra
T09D4157:105b-36: gyur // brtas // bsgrags so // mi bdag gang
T09D4157:105b-37: zhig dngos su ri dags sha ra bha yi ri
T09D4157:105b-38: dags gsad phyir rta la zhon nas ni //
T09D4157:105b-39: mgyogs brgyugs pa las khron par lhung nas de mngon song ste g-yang sa las gang phyung gyur pa //
T09D4157:105b-40: mi shes pa dang bu yang mtshungs nyid lta bu
T09D4157:106a-0: kho nar byas te rjes su brtse ba @106a *
T09D4157:106a-2: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zad mdzangs par gyur das chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:106a-3: mi gang chu bos khyer gyur sna tshogs mdzes pa'i ru ru'i ri dags kyis ni phyung nas su //
T09D4157:106a-4: 'di skad mngags te 'jig rten su la'ang ma smra kho bo gnas kyang ma brjod zhes pa las //
T09D4157:106a-5: des ni sa 'dzin la ni lag bas mi rnams la bstan mkhrig ma gcig ni chad par gyur //
T09D4157:106a-6: mi de'ang skyabs shing mi yi dbang po la ni
T09D4157:106a-7: gdams byas de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:106a-8: // gnas gang zhig na ljon pa'i ri dang ldan
T09D4157:106a-9: pa'i 'bras bu lhung gyur chu bos khyer ba zhig
T09D4157:106a-10: / rgyal po de yi mthu rtsal rjes su 'tshol
T09D4157:106a-11: bas rang gi gnyen rnams gsad 'dod ri bo'i rtser
T09D4157:106a-12: // // rang gi rkang pa gnyis char rab tu
T09D4157:106a-13: sra bar bcings te sra bar byas nas mthar phyung
T09D4157:106a-14: // // nus // ngal bas der ni bdag nyid
T09D4157:106a-15: dor gyur de yi rjes su chos kyi gand'i'i sgra
T09D4157:106a-16: // // nus // bsgrags so // brdzun pas rab
T09D4157:106a-17: tu brtags pa'i skyon gyis nyams par 'os pa'i blo
T09D4157:106a-18: gros can yid rang gi lus //
T09D4157:106a-19: 'dar zhing khro bas mi bdag 'jigs byed mig ni
T09D4157:106a-20: dmar zhing nyon mongs ral gri sa rab tu bcom
T09D4157:106a-21: // bden pa'i don can bzod par smra bas rang
T09D4157:106a-22: lus ltos dor gang zhig 'gar yang mi bzod pas
T09D4157:106a-23: // / rab tu gnod par byed la gnod bzod
T09D4157:106a-24: yid la byed pa'i chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:106a-25: // / // mi yi bdag po yan lag byin
T09D4157:106a-26: ni mi dge chad lta rab tu bskyed la tshangs
T09D4157:106a-28: mdun gyi nam mkhar gnas te rab tu gsal ba'i tshig gis sun phyung 'jig rten gzhan pa ni //
T09D4157:106a-29: thugs brtses bsrungs te mi shes pa yi mun pa mtha' dag rab tu bcom nas mi bden pa'i //
T09D4157:106a-30: lta ba'i dra ba gcod byed blo gros ldan pa de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:106a-31: shin tu mthug pa'i nags su gnas nas phyung tshe mi ni bdun brgya mthong nas nye ba yi //
T09D4157:106a-32: ri bo'i steng na glang chen mchog ni shi ba'i sha yod song la lam brgyags byos zhes smras //
T09D4157:106a-33: glang po'i rgyal po gang zhig brtse bar ldan bya'i ri bo'i rtse nas bdag nyid lus mchongs dor //
T09D4157:106a-34: srog chags rnams la byams ldan rdul rnams spangs pa de yi chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:106a-35: gang zhig shin tu dul bas tsha gdung mi yi
T09D4157:106b-0: sgyu @106b ma dang ni sha tshil glo bas mngon
T09D4157:106b-1: gang bar // su da sa ni chos kyi dbyi
T09D4157:106b-2: gus dpe med brtse ba brtson 'grus bden pa rab
T09D4157:106b-3: gang bar // tu 'khrungs // de thabs smon pas
T09D4157:106b-4: srog chags sman pa dang ni bde ba'i cho gas
T09D4157:106b-5: gang bar // tu 'khrungs // srid pa'i gnas //
T09D4157:106b-6: sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal slar zlog pa yi
T09D4157:106b-7: don byas chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so //
T09D4157:106b-8: na dang skye ba la sogs zug rdu 'jigs pa
T09D4157:106b-9: mang po mthong ste 'bar ba'i me stag rab 'phro
T09D4157:106b-10: ba'i // khang pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir ni 'gro 'di mtha' dag skyo ba'i sems gyur cing //
T09D4157:106b-11: rgyal po'i phun tshogs ji ltar rtsva bzhin gang spangs lcags khyim chen por bsrungs na yang //
T09D4157:106b-12: nags mthar rab tu song gyur de yi rjes su
T09D4157:106b-13: legs pa'i spyod ldan chos kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags so
T09D4157:106b-14: // rtag tu mang po'i rnam pas rnam par gnod
T09D4157:106b-15: byed yal ga ri dags 'dug pa 'khrugs pas ni
T09D4157:106b-16: // // gang 'dod mchog gi lus can lang tsho
T09D4157:106b-17: ldan pa'i ma he la ni gnod sbyin gyis bskul
T09D4157:106b-18: // // nas // gang brjod mtha' dag shin tu
T09D4157:106b-19: bzod pa'i yon tan gter gyur thar pa'i lam gyi
T09D4157:106b-21: dang mtshungs pa yi mi g-yo de yi chos kyi
T09D4157:106b-23: gang zhig 'dab gshog rgyas pa yon tan brgya phrag rab mchog yang dag brgyan pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
T09D4157:106b-24: bya zhig byung gyur ri dags dgra yi mgrin par
T09D4157:106b-25: rus pa'i dum bu ring por zug pa phyung byas
T09D4157:106b-26: te // ri dags des slar bsad cing za phyir
T09D4157:106b-27: brnyas thob gyur mod de ni nus na'ang khro ma
T09D4157:106b-28: te // gyur // bzod pa'i zhing de'i 'chi med
T09D4157:106b-29: rang bzhin 'bras bu bcas gyur chos kyi gand'i'i sgra
T09D4157:106b-30: te // gyur // bsgrags so // ji srid ri
T09D4157:106b-31: rab nyi ma zla bas rab gsal rtse nas 'od
T09D4157:106b-32: chen 'phros pas snang bar byas ljongs dang //
T09D4157:106b-33: ji srid chu bo 'dzin khri nya dang chu srin
T09D4157:106b-34: rlung rnams kyis dkrugs gnas ni lan tshva'i rgya mtsho
T09D4157:106b-35: dang // ji srid sa ni ri dang grong dang
T09D4157:106b-36: ljon shing nags tshal grong khyer ljongs dang lteng rgyun
T09D4157:106b-37: dang // 'bab bcas gnas ; / de srid mdor
T09D4157:106b-38: na ston pa'i bka' yis srid pa'i khang pa mi
T09D4157:106b-39: bzad lhung gyur 'gro ba mtha' dag rab zhi shog
T09D4157:106b-40: / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi chos
T09D4157:106b-41: kyi gand'i'i sgra bsgrags pa snyan dngags mkhan chen po
T09D4157:106b-42: slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T09D4157:107a-1: chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral
T09D4157:107a-2: ba'i pandi ta chen po kha che sh'akya shr'i bzang
